txt.en: A wealth of lore awaits those who brave the Bones of Barad-dûr.
You have successfully braved the Bones of Barad-dûr and gathered many ancient tomes.
Completed Barad-dûr: Lore of the Past.

A notice is pinned to the board:

'Ancient tomes can be found in Barad-dûr. A brave adventurer is needed to seek out this lost lore. Seek out Candúr in Udûn to learn more.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Barad-dûr: Realm of the Black Word to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
Candúr can be found in Udûn.\n\nYou should talk Candúr.
Complete Barad-dûr: Lore of the Past
